//r.

I don`t know nothing about the quality of this torrent, but the movie itself is amazing, with deep philosophical charge in it.
It`s about a madness that is acted - madmen are not real, they are enjoying pretending mentally retarded.
The madness, idiocy is cool thing untill it is like a game. But who would dare transpose idiocy into real life settings?
There are a lots of funny scenes watching this movie, but the final will probably will make some watchers move to tears.

Bad combing, 4X3 version.
How anyone can call this uncompressed is beyond me... It's unwatchable.

uncompressed, is, well, uncompressed.

cinesimon: do you have the same edition in a larger file - I think not.

What a silly comment...

the original aspect ratio, 1.37:1, is pretty much 4:3.  

Do you think I can magically add dimension to films just to please you???

Thank you. Downloaded this 2 years ago.
One of my favorite films. :)
